Package algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.data

Class TriviaGameState

java.lang.Object
algonquin.cst2335.finalproject.data.TriviaGameState
public class TriviaGameState extends Object
This class is used to track the current state of the trivia game. It holds the number of questions, the question the user is currently on, the current category, the number of questions the user has answered correctly, the difficulty of the trivia, and the list of questions (and their corresponding answers).

    Class

    static class 
    TriviaGameState.Question
    This class stores the information associated with a trivia question, with the question, correct answer, and incorrect answers.
